definition: Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
potable water (water with low salt content)/fresh water
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Danshui or Tanshui town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Despite living in freshwater, it is also resembles marine turtles.
sentences.chinese: 儘管豬鼻龜生活在淡水中，它同時又很像海龜。

sentences.english: Farm irrigation from these free-flowing bodies is the biggest single human use of freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 自由流通水體的農場灌溉是人們最大的淡水單一使用。

sentences.english: The growth performance of red tilapia cultured in freshwater was superior to other tilapia species.
sentences.chinese: 星洲紅魚在淡水中養殖生長表現優於其他羅非魚品種。

sentences.english: Loch Ness is the most voluminous fresh water lake in Great Britain.
sentences.chinese: 尼斯湖是英國最大的淡水湖。

sentences.english: Mosquitofish, freshwater fish with a taste for mosquito larvae, are highly social.
sentences.chinese: 食蚊魚是淡水魚，以蚊子幼蟲爲食，高度的羣體化。

sentences.english: Any of various Old World freshwater fishes of the genus Barbus or Puntius and related genera.
sentences.chinese: 一種東半球䰾屬或須䰾屬及有關科屬的淡水魚類。

sentences.english: Inspections of freshwater fish at local markets would be stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 會加強檢驗本地街市售賣的淡水魚。

sentences.english: What's the fare from Jingmei to Danshui?
sentences.chinese: 坐捷運從景美到淡水的票價是多少？

sentences.english: I want to get to Tansui. What's the best way?
sentences.chinese: 我要去淡水，最近的路怎麼走？

sentences.english: Research on fresh water and marine nematodes is also considered.
sentences.chinese: 同時也刊載有關淡水和海洋中線蟲的研究。

sentences.english: Another is a shortage of land and freshwater for use in aquaculture.
sentences.chinese: 另一個障礙是用於水產養殖的土地和淡水資源不足。

sentences.english: Any of about 100 species of small, slender freshwater fishes (family Percidae), native to eastern North America.
sentences.chinese: 鱸形目鱸科鏢鱸亞科約一百種小型細長淡水魚的統稱。

sentences.english: Thee river is ten times the length of the Tamsui River.
sentences.chinese: 這條河的長度是淡水河的十倍。

sentences.english: The Sea of Galilee, in Israel, is a freshwater lake.
sentences.chinese: 以色列的加利利海，是淡水湖。

sentences.english: The river is ten times the length of the Tamsui River.
sentences.chinese: 這條河的長度是淡水河的十倍。

sentences.english: Lampetra japonica could migrate to the Yellow Sea region and freshwater in Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 日本七鰓鰻可以遷移到黃海及江蘇省淡水中。

definition: water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
